name: playwright_context_isolation
description: Browser contexts for session isolation and parallel testing

args: const { chromium } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const context1 = await browser.newContext(); const context2 = await browser.newContext(); const page1 = await context1.newPage(); const page2 = await context2.newPage(); await page1.goto('https://example.com'); await page2.goto('https://example.com'); console.log('Two isolated contexts created'); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Two isolated contexts created

Independent browser sessions

args: const { chromium, devices } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const context = await browser.newContext({...devices['iPhone 12'], geolocation: {latitude: 40.7128, longitude: -74.0060}, permissions: ['geolocation']}); const page = await context.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); console.log('Mobile context with geolocation'); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Mobile context with geolocation

Device emulation with location

args: const { chromium } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const context = await browser.newContext({recordVideo: {dir: '/tmp/videos/'}, viewport: {width: 1280, height: 720}}); const page = await context.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); await page.waitForTimeout(2000); await context.close(); console.log('Video recorded'); await browser.close(); })();
